ABOUT ME

Beyond...

Pictures are all pre-pandemic or from take-out my dad picked up. We've been staying at home since March, with contact being limited to my dad picking up groceries or take-out.

Seattle

Jun 3, 2020 — Welcome to one of my favorite cities!! 😊 While it’s known for the constant rain, the Seattle summer weather is absolutely perfect - mid-70s, shining sun until 9PM, and minimal rain. What you wouldn’t expect, though, are the unique attractions, beautiful landscape, and some of the best food you’ll find around! See all the places I went below…...


Los Angeles

Apr 2, 2020 — WELCOME TO THE CITY OF ANGELS! Having lived in the same place my whole life on the East Coast, I had always been interested in life on the West Coast. New York City is a very fast city - everyone is always on the move and in a rush. Los Angeles is what some might consider NYC’s polar...


New Orleans

Mar 1, 2020 — Welcome to The Big Easy, a city full of jazz, crazy good food, and of course, Mardi Gras! New Orleans (NOLA) is truly a city like no other. Yes, every city has its own unique charms, but NOLA has a distinctive, one-of-a-kind style and such a vibrant scene with endless things to do. New Orleans has high-rise buildings,...
